visits.text: Sculpture galleries and gopurams of the complex

itineraries.title: HAMPI TEMPLES, GOA SHORES & NILGIRIS: THE SOUTH INDIA HERITAGE LOOP

activities.text: Organizing bus tickets to Hampi and luggage storage near Majestic
Express urban walk around Cubbon Park

visits.text: Arrival in Hampi area, morning crossing of the archaeological site on foot

activities.text: Local ferry on the Tungabhadra (according to schedules, approx. until 6pm)

visits.text: Vijaya Vittala Temple and Stone Chariot

activities.text: Bike/scooter ride on the Anegundi side (ruins and viewpoints)

visits.text: Anjaneya Hill (Hanuman Temple) — stair climb and panorama

Organizing the trip to Goa (night bus recommended)

Excursion to Cabo de Rama Fort (South Goa)

itineraries.title: RAJASTHAN: FROM DESERT PALACES TO ROMANTIC LAKES

visits.text: Discovery of the Taj Mahal, white marble mausoleum symbol of eternal love.
Visit of Agra Fort, former imperial residence of the Mughal emperors.
Exploration of the Tomb of Itimad-ud-Daulah, nicknamed the Baby Taj.

activities.text: Sunset over the Taj Mahal from Mehta Bagh park.

visits.text: Discovery of the Palace of Winds (Hawa Mahal) and its famous perforated facades.
Visit of the City Palace, residence of the Maharajas of Jaipur.
Exploration of Amber Fort and Panna Meena Ka Kund, a spectacular stepwell.

activities.text: Bike excursion with Cyclin'Jaipur discovering markets and temples at sunrise.
Photo stop at Patrika Gate, famous for its colors and detailed frescoes.
Visit of the Monkey Temple (Galta Ji) nestled at the bottom of a less frequented valley.

visits.text: Discovery of the sacred lake of Pushkar and its lively ghats.
Observation of morning and evening Hindu ceremonies by the lake.

activities.text: Walking tour around the sacred lake and meditation on the ghats.
Sunset from Jaipur Ghat, in the heart of chants and celebrations.

visits.text: Walking ascent to Mehrangarh Fort overlooking the blue city.
Discovery of the Jaswant Thada cenotaph and its peaceful gardens.
Strolling through Sardar Market and around the Clock Tower.

activities.text: Stop at Toorji Ka Jhalra, an ancient restored stepwell.
Free exploration of the Blue City district and its colorful alleyways.

visits.text: Visit to the City Palace of Udaipur and its superb interior courtyards.
Boat ride on Lake Pichola to admire the palaces and Jag Mandir island.
Discovery of Bagore Ki Haveli, museum and venue for traditional performances.

activities.text: Indian cooking class with Sashi Cooking Classes to discover local flavors.
Relaxation by the lake and sunset watching at Ambrai Ghat.

visits.text: Discovery of downtown Trivandrum and Padmanabhaswamy temple

activities.text: Dinner on the coast with view of the Arabian Sea

Exploration of villages and coconut plantations by bicycle

Visit to the Munnar tea museum

activities.text: Sunrise observation over the misty hills

visits.text: Walk in Fort Cochin and observation of Chinese fishing nets
Visit to the Jewish synagogue and the Dutch Palace

activities.text: Sunset cruise on the Arabian Sea

activities.text: Observation of pilgrims and local ceremonies

itineraries.title: INTENSIVE RAJASTHAN: LAKES OF UDAIPUR, CITADELS, TIGERS OF RANTHAMBORE, HOLI IN PUSHKAR, JODHPUR, TAJ MAHAL AND DELHI

visits.text: Old town of Udaipur: alleyways, ghats of Lake Pichola and markets (clothing, jewelry, spices)
Shree Jagdish Temple (architecture and local fervor)
City Palace of Udaipur (exteriors and courtyards)

activities.text: Guided warm-up tour in the old city (English)
Dharohar Folk Dance show (dance and puppets)
Boat ride on Lake Pichola (views of the city and City Palace)

visits.text: Vijay Stambha (Tower of Victory) and surrounding temples

activities.text: Tuk-tuk or vehicle loop within the fort enclosure (extensive site)

activities.text: Discovery of the other baoris/stepwells of the city (exteriors)

activities.text: Gypsy safari (4x4, dawn) at Ranthambore National Park
